verses.verse: Now it came <WH1961> about when all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567> who <WH834> [were] beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> to the west, <WH3220> and all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the Canaanites <WH3669> who <WH834> [were] by the sea, <WH3220> heard <WH8085> how <WH854> <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had dried <WH3001> up the waters <WH4325> of the Jordan <WH3383> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> until <WH5704> they had crossed, <WH5674> that their hearts <WH3824> melted, <WH4549> and there was no <WH3808> spirit <WH7307> in them any <WH5750> longer, <WH5750> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

At that time <WH6256> the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> "Make <WH6213> for yourself flint <WH6864> knives <WH2719> and circumcise <WH4135> again <WH7725> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the second <WH8145> time. <WH8145>"
So Joshua <WH3091> made <WH6213> himself flint <WH6864> knives <WH2719> and circumcised <WH4135> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> at Gibeath-haaraloth.

And this <WH2088> is the reason <WH1697> why <WH834> Joshua <WH3091> circumcised <WH4135> them: all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> who came <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> who were males, <WH2145> all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of war, <WH4421> died <WH4191> in the wilderness <WH4057> along the way, <WH1870> after they came <WH3318> out of Egypt. <WH4714>

For all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> who came <WH3318> out were circumcised, <WH4135> but all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> who were born <WH3209> in the wilderness <WH4057> along the way <WH1870> as they came <WH3318> out of Egypt <WH4714> had not been circumcised. <WH4135>

For the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> walked <WH1980> forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness, <WH4057> until <WH5704> all <WH3605> the nation, <WH1471> [that is,] the men <WH376> of war <WH4421> who came <WH3318> out of Egypt, <WH4714> perished <WH8552> because <WH834> they did not listen <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of the Lord, <WH3068> to whom <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had sworn <WH7650> that He would not let them see <WH7200> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> had sworn <WH7650> to their fathers to give <WH1> us, a land <WH5414> flowing <WH776> with milk <WH2100> and honey. <WH2461>

And their children <WH1121> whom He raised <WH6965> up in their place, <WH8478> Joshua <WH3091> circumcised; <WH4135> for they were uncircumcised, <WH6189> because <WH3588> they had not circumcised <WH4135> them along the way. <WH1870>

Now it came <WH1961> about when <WH9201> they had finished <WH8552> circumcising <WH4135> all <WH3605> the nation, <WH1471> that they remained <WH3427> in their places <WH8478> in the camp <WH4264> until <WH5704> they were healed. <WH2421>

Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> "Today <WH3117> I have rolled <WH1556> away <WH1556> the reproach <WH2781> of Egypt <WH4714> from you." So the name <WH8034> of that place <WH4725> is called <WH7121> Gilgal <WH1537> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

While the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> camped <WH2583> at Gilgal, <WH1537> they observed <WH6213> the Passover <WH6453> on the evening <WH6153> of the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> on the desert <WH6160> plains <WH6160> of Jericho. <WH3405>

And on the day <WH4283> after <WH4283> the Passover, <WH6453> on that very <WH6106> day, <WH3117> they ate <WH398> some <WH4480> of the produce <WH5669> of the land, <WH776> unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH4682> and parched <WH7033> [grain].

And the manna <WH4478> ceased <WH7673> on the day <WH4283> after <WH4283> they had eaten <WH398> some <WH4480> of the produce <WH8393> of the land, <WH776> so that the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> no <WH3808> longer <WH5750> had <WH1961> manna, <WH4478> but they ate <WH398> some <WH4480> of the yield <WH8393> of the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> during that year. <WH8141>

Now it came <WH1961> about when Joshua <WH3091> was by Jericho, <WH3405> that he lifted <WH5375> up his eyes <WH5869> and looked, <WH7200> and behold, <WH2009> a man <WH376> was standing <WH5975> opposite <WH5048> him with his sword <WH2719> drawn <WH8025> in his hand, <WH3027> and Joshua <WH3091> went <WH1980> to him and said <WH559> to him, "Are you for us or <WH518> for our adversaries <WH6862>?"

And he said, <WH559> "No, <WH3808> rather <WH3588> I indeed <WH3588> come <WH935> now <WH6258> [as] captain <WH8269> of the host <WH6635> of the Lord. <WH3068>" And Joshua <WH3091> fell <WH5307> on his face <WH6440> to the earth, <WH776> and bowed <WH7812> down, <WH7812> and said <WH559> to him, "What <WH4100> has my lord <WH136> to say <WH1696> to his servant <WH5650>?"

And the captain <WH8269> of the Lord's host <WH6635> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> "Remove <WH5394> your sandals <WH5275> from your feet, <WH7272> for the place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH5921> you are standing <WH5975> is holy. <WH6944>" And Joshua <WH3091> did <WH6213> so. <WH3651>
